AN ACT TO MAKE PROVIBIONG FOR THE CULTIVATION OF

PAYMENT OF MONEY IN LIEU OF SUCH CULTIVATION; FOR,
THE ESTABLISHMENT OF 4 Foon Propucmion FUND;
